summary: A New race along the lines of the movie character Blade.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard

Daywalker Race - A daywalker is created when an unborn child is infected with vampirism from the mother being bitten during pregnancy.  Most don\'t survive, but those that do have many of the powers of vampires, but none of the weaknesses. (Paraphrase of the movie info about daywalkers)

Skill Bonuses
One-handed - 5
Two-handed - 5
Block - 10
Smithing - 5
Alchemy - 5
Alteration - 5
Illusion - 5

Specials
Daywalker Abilities - resist disease 100, fortify carry weight 200
Daywalker Strength - Double attack damage (except for magic)
Night Eye - Lesser Power 
Supernatural Reflexes - Lesser Power (costs 100 magicka)
Vampire Seduction - Power (once per day)
author: Hex Eddie
